name: mrtrix3preproc
label: MRtrix3: Preprocessing Pipeline
description: mrtrix3preproc runs the MRtrix3 preprocessing pipeline. It uses FSL's topup when the optional inverse phase encoded data are provided, otherwise the pipeline uses FSL's eddy tool. The pipeline can also perform de-noising, reslicing, and alignment to an anatomical image. Required inputs are diffusion NIfTI, BVEC, BVAL, and Anatomical (ACPC aligned) NIfTI.
author: MRtrix, FSL, and Brain-Life teams.

rpe.description: Specify if there are reverse phase encoded data. Options are 'none', 'header', 'pairs', 'all'. [default=none]

eddy.description: Perform eddy current correction. If inverted phase encoding direction files are found, eddy will be done as part of topup. [default=true]

bias.description: Compute bias correction with ANTs on dwi data [default=true]

norm.description: Perform intensity normalization of dwi data [default=false]

nval.description: Normalize the intensity of the FA white matter mask to this number [default=1000]

acpc.description: Align dwi data with AC-PC anatomy [default=false]

reslice.description: Optional. By default reslicing is not done. If you want it done, set doreslice=true and set a number (e.g., 1) here to reslice the dwi data to this isotropic voxel size (in mm).

ANAT.description: Optional anatomical T1w NIfTI image. Required only if acpc=true

RDIF.description: Optional reverse phase encoded (rpe) diffusion NIfTI image.

RBVL.description: Optional reverse phase encoded (rpe) BVAL file.

RBVC.description: Optional reverse phase encoded (rpe) BVEC file.
